column5: He passed away today, aged 89.  Natural causes. I loved his music and always will, great cruising sounds for us of that generation. He had many hits and did concerts with Rick Nelson. His version of Blueberry Hill has many memorys for many people,  haha. May he rest in peace in Rock and Roll Heaven..
Great performer; he'll live on with his recordings. In my 50 Chevy I pay his music all the time and its good and loud! It is sad but he's at rest now and wont be forgotten; by his fans.  Dan
Another great leaves us. So many this year.
A true legend and most importantly ORR, Original Rock and Rolla.
Man, who is going to replace all these lost artists this year? Its ridiculous! Someone should make an album that includes all the lost souls this year, it would be amazing!  S.
